schemas.description: Sloan Digital Sky Survey Data Release 16

tables.description: Contains data from a given plate used for spectroscopic observations.
Contains the measured parameters for a spectrum.
A view of specobjall that just has the clean spectra. The view excludes QA and Sky and duplicates. Use this as the main way to access the spectro objects.
A view of specobjall that includes only SEGUE-1+SEGUE-2 spectra.
A view of specobjall that includes only SEGUE-1 spectra.
A view of specobjall that includes only SEGUE-2 spectra.
The full photometric catalog quantities for SDSS imaging.
Contains the measured stellar population parameters for a spectrum.
